title: In search of a similar font
content:
Thanks! Also, doesn't need to look "distressed" like this example.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cyclone.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101123093258/http:/typophile.com/files/cyclone.jpg) | 58.26 KB |
author: laurabachman

comments.content: Your sample might have been handlettered, but for a similar style you might want to check out [Boston Truckstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20101123093258/http:/letterheadfonts.com/contributors/kenmctague/bostontruckstyle.shtml).
